definition: surname Ren/Ren County 任縣|任县[Ren2 Xian4] in Hebei

to assign/to appoint/to take up a post/office/responsibility/to let/to allow/to give free rein to/no matter (how, what etc)/classifier for terms served in office, or for spouses, girlfriends etc (as in 前任男友)

sentences.english: Sports injury accidents can be divided into schools and accidents.
sentences.chinese: 这种非学校责任事故分为两种。

sentences.english: There is no accident out of negligence in my factory.
sentences.chinese: 我们厂没有出现任何责任事故。

sentences.english: This fire was determined to be an accident caused by negligence.
sentences.chinese: 这火灾被认定为是责任事故。

sentences.english: We have not only the responsibility to prevent incidents of food, but also face up to it from happening.
sentences.chinese: 我们不但要预防食品责任事故，还应正视它的发生。

sentences.english: These accidents have been ascertained through investigation to be major liability accidents.
sentences.chinese: 通过调查认定，都是重特大责任事故。

definition: mass incident (PRC term for incidents of social unrest, including rioting, melees and petition campaigns)
to conceal or deceive in a report/to falsify by over- or underreporting
to cause an accident/to be responsible for an incident/to provoke a disturbance
at fault/blamed for/responsible (for a blunder or crime)
culpable driving causing serious damage or injury
